column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The wandering Loporrit is looking for “work.”
Speak with the hamlet resident.
Place the bags of beast repellent at the designated locations.
Speak with the hamlet resident.
Speak with the wandering Loporrit.
Haven't we met before? You're...one of Urianger's friends, yes?
Ah, I thought so! I'm here wandering around Labyrinthos, hoping to find some “work” to do. It sounds like such fun!
But I don't even know where to start or how to ask for it. Can you help me?
What will you say?
Of course!
I suppose...
Well then, what are we waiting for!? Let's find someone with “work” for me!
Perhaps this person can help us!
Is there something I can help you and your...uh...friend with?
Hm, I'd heard Loporrits were interested in learning about our culture. And you're saying this one is looking for a job...?
Yes, I would like to “work” at a “job”! Do you know of one I could do?
Well, most people here work at Aporia or Thaumazein, but we would need to submit documents to request the proper level of clearance and─ Oh! I have an idea!

As you've seen, the man-made habitats hereabouts are populated by a variety of experimental subjects. Some of the bolder beasts, however, have been known to cause unfortunate incidents in and around the elemental reactors.

In order to encourage these creatures to keep their distance, we've put together some bags of noxious-smelling repellent. I'd appreciate it if you could place a few of them by the reactors themselves.
For now, I need you to ward two such facilities: the one to the south, and the one to the west of Logistikon Beta. Here, there's an armful for each of you so you can split the work.
Oh. I'm sorry for making you “work,” too. But that means we can share the payment as well!
Right! I'll go to the south reactor, and you take the one in the west. Work, work, work...
Go ahead and place a few of those bags by the reactor west of Logistikon Beta.
I'm all done! Would you mind making a report to our employer?
Thank you both for your cooperation. I'll hand the payment to our lunar friend here so that she might have the full “job” experience.
Oh, and I'll throw in some apples from Meryall Agronomics, too. Enjoy!
Oh, a new food to try! Let's head back up the stairs and eat them together!
Time to munch on these “apples”! They look delicious, don't they?
Oh my... They don't just look delicious, they <Emphasis>are</Emphasis> delicious! They might be even better than carrots...
I thought this place would be just like Mare Lamentorum since it's all artificial, but I'm glad I was wrong.
I was wrong about a lot, even after everything Urianger told me to expect. And I learned so much at my “job”! I think I want to try another one.
Oh, before I forget, here's your share of our payment. Thank you for all your help!
